arts.ttl: Four things we learnt from Burnley's defeat at Tottenham
arts.sum: For around 40 minutes of the match Burnley showed that the new set up can be effective as they kept Tottenham quiet and worked their way into the game. Showing Burnley's need to add quality to the squad in midfield and defence especially if they want to move forward with the 5-2-2-1 set up that manager Scott Parker has been utilising.

arts.ttl: Richarlison sends Tottenham fans message after emphatic display vs Burnley
arts.sum: Richarlison was the star of the show as Tottenham dismantled Burnley 3-0 on Saturday. Frank got off to the perfect start to his domestic tenure... The post Richarlison sends Tottenham fans message after emphatic display vs Burnley appeared first on Tottenham Hotspur News.

arts.ttl: Spurs 3-0 Burnley: Richarlison stole the show to prove he CAN be the complete forward - but here's why fans shouldn't get carried away after Burnley brace, WRITES MATT BARLOW
arts.sum: The chance for the hat-trick vanished but the stadium rose in a roar to acclaim Richarlison as Thomas Frank called an end to his shift with the game won.

arts.ttl: Richarlison double helps Spurs see off Burnley
arts.sum: Two goals from Richarlison, including a stunning scissor kick, help Thomas Frank win his first Premier League match in charge of Tottenham against Burnley.

arts.ttl: Richarlison brace helps Tottenham win season opener against Burnley
arts.sum: It was Spurs’ first Premier League win since April 6.

arts.ttl: Spurs benefit from brand new Premier League rule as Burnley star embarrassed
arts.sum: History was made during Tottenham's clash with Burnley as goalkeeper Martin Dubravka became the first player in the Premier League to fall foul of a new rule change

arts.ttl: Stunning Richarlison brace sinks Burnley as Spurs make winning start
arts.sum: Richarlison hit a pair of stunning volleys to help Tottenham on their way to a comfortable 3-0 win over Burnley. It was a strong start to the Premier League campaign for Thomas Frank’s Spurs, who had their first goal of the season after just ten minutes as Richarlison fired home Mohammed Kudus’ cross.

arts.ttl: Tottenham Hotspur vs Burnley: Premier League Preview, Gameweek 1, 2025
arts.sum: Spurs had waited 17 years for a trophy since the 2008 League Cup before they beat Manchester United 1-0 in the Europa League final in May. Their reward was a battle with Paris Saint-Germain for the prize of the UEFA Super Cup, and after 80 minutes, there were two goals ahead in Udine. James Trafford took the chance to return to Manchester City, whose squad he left for two years of first team football with the Clarets .

arts.ttl: Tottenham Hotspur vs Burnley – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Thomas Frank begins his tenure as Tottenham manager on Saturday against newly-promoted Burnley, tasked with improving on last season’s poor 17th-place league finish. Despite that domestic form, Spurs enter the campaign as a Champions League club after their Europa League final victory. arts.sum: Burnley open their Premier League return with a stern test at Tottenham Hotspur on Saturday, facing the north London side at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. Scott Parker’s promoted team will bid for consolidation through compact play, up against a Spurs outfit motivated by recent European triumph.
